subject: Re: Foreign/Local Compensation Payment Commission
body:
World United States office of the Finance Complex
Foreign/Local Compensation Payment Commission
U.S. Headquarters: 6400 C Street SW, Washington Dc  52499


Dear Beneficiary Ms Barbara,
Reference Number UNPB/UN/05X2S/2024

Honestly i got your message and am very sorry for my late reply due to official actives , Please note that you name and email was selected on the ruffle drawn on payment scheme as approved by the United States government on self developmental and establishment fund on some individuals both home and abroad ok.

According this payment , you are given not more than five days to reply and show your interest ,commitment to enable you receive this , failure to reply, we will remove your name that is what it means ok.

Finally you have to check below and send your full details information to enable us start your payment without delay , do you want receive your fund through ATM card payment or bank transfer into your bank account , then reply and send the required information ,is that clear?

We are pleased to inform you about the outcome of the final decision made after the meeting held by this International World oil and Gas Executive board at the United States government Complex and the British ,Europe, Asia and African commission, the United nation and the World Bank Organization, and International Monetary Fund (IMF) and all the of American representatives here in World United States office of the Finance Complex Washington Dc., with regards to all Foreign/local compensation payment to all the Scam and non Scam victims of the world countries.

This is to inform you that your name was listed among a few to receive the sum of $56.5 million United States Dollars only as your retrieved and full compensation sum from this board, also be informed that your compensation with Reference Number UNPB/UN/05X2S/2024 would be reserved for FIVE working days after which will be terminated, if there is no response from you.

Please endeavor to contact the Account Officer in-charge of your payment which is (Attorney Soyer L. Meyer ) with your Payment Approval Reference Number UNPB/UN/05X2S/2024,..

Also Send your details as follows, full name............., contact address............., Age..............., Sex...........,Occupation.............,Company............ and direct phone number ................. and Int'l Passport or ID card via attachment to  email contact detail is ( attorney_leonard_meyer2012@live.com  )

Note that as soon as you are ready to comply with the official directive on payment guideline, law and order, my office will immediately complete your payment via ATM card, or bank to bank Transfer etc, in just few hours as you are required to only secure payment processing order .

Thanks for your cooperation as we await your swift reply.

Regards,

Mr. Soyer L. Meyer
A/C officer World United States office of the Finance
Foreign/Local Compensation Payment Commission




===========================================================
Re: World United States office o
Inbox
[https://ssl.gstatic.com/ui/v1/icons/mail/profile_mask2.png]
ec82207@***.com
Feb 8, 2024, 10:27â€¯PM (7 days ago)
to me
[https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/images/cleardot.gif]



Hello Mr. Soyer L. Meyer,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about the decisions made by the World Oil and Gas Executive board, United Nations, World Bank Monetary Fund IMF, and other organizations.

I'm curious to know more about this process. Could you please explain how my name was selected among the few to receive this sum? Also, could you provide more details on what exactly a 'retrieved and full sum' means?

You mentioned that my payment would be reserved for FIVE working days. What happens after these five days if I don't respond?

Lastly, you mentioned several methods of payment like ATM card or bank transfer. Could you elaborate on these options? How does each method work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Foreign/Local Compensation Payment Commission
body:
Hello Mr. Soyer L. Meyer,

Thank you for your detailed email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about the decisions made by the World Oil and Gas Executive board, United Nations, World Bank Monetary Fund IMF, and other organizations.

I'm intrigued to know more about this process. Could you please explain how my name was selected among the few to receive this sum? Also, could you provide more details on what exactly 'retrieved and full sum' means?

You mentioned that my payment would be reserved for FIVE working days. What happens after these five days if I don't respond?

Lastly, you mentioned several methods of payment like ATM card or bank transfer. Could you elaborate on these options? How does each method work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: Foreign/Local Compensation Payment Commission
body:
Hello Mr. Soyer L. Meyer,

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite an honor to be selected in such a manner by the World Oil and Gas Executive board, United Nations, World Bank Monetary Fund IMF, and other esteemed organizations.

I'm a bit confused about how my name was chosen for this opportunity. Could you please explain the selection process? Also, what does 'retrieved and full sum' mean in this context?

You mentioned that my payment would be reserved for FIVE working days. What happens if I am unable to respond within this timeframe?

Regarding the payment methods - ATM card or bank transfer - could you provide more information on how these work? For instance, how would I receive an ATM card and how can I use it? And if I choose bank transfer, what are the steps involved?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara
